parameters.name: AutoSubmit
parameters.description:
Whether import the log of SAS alert, the log of WAF alert, the log of CFW alert or not. Valid values:
- 0: not imported automatically
- 1: imported automatically

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The data management center of the threat analysis feature. Specify this parameter based on the region where your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions inside China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the account that you switch from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:
- 0: the current Alibaba Cloud account
- 1: the global account
